snippet: At a Bronx plant that has been plagued by problems, a firm is said to have evaded requirements on oversight by an electrician and on hiring companies owned by women or minorities.
lead_paragraph: At a Bronx plant that has been plagued by problems, a firm is said to have evaded requirements on oversight by an electrician and on hiring companies owned by women or minorities.

headline.seo: Company Defrauded City in Water Plant Work, Contractor Says
headline.main: Company Defrauded City in Water Plant Work, Contractor Says
headline.print_headline: Company Defrauded City in Water Plant Work, Contractor Says
